title: Scout the Route
description: Ride ahead of the column. Map the terrain and spot any threats before we march into them.

success.text: You spot a bandit ambush and warn the column. The captain himself thanks you.

failure.text: You rode past the signs of an ambush. Men died. The blood's on your hands.

critical_failure.text: The ambush caught you and your escort. Two men don't come back. You barely escaped.

decline.text: The lieutenant's face hardens. A scout who won't scout is no use to anyone.

title: Treat the Wounded
description: The surgeon needs hands. Help with the injured after the skirmish.

success.text: Your steady hands save a man's arm. The soldiers remember who helped when they were hurt.

failure.text: You couldn't hold him still. The surgeon had to work around your fumbling.

decline.text: The surgeon needed help. You walked away. The wounded won't forget.

title: Equipment Repair
description: Fix what's broken before the next fight. The armorer needs skilled hands.

success.text: You mend armor, straighten blades, and fix a dozen buckles. By morning, we're battle-ready.

failure.text: Your repairs don't hold. A man's strap breaks in battle. He nearly dies.

decline.text: 'Too good for the forge?' The lieutenant's disappointment is clear.

title: Forage Supplies
description: Find food and useful material in the countryside. Take two men and a cart.

success.text: You find a forgotten orchard and an abandoned root cellar. The company eats well tonight.

failure.text: Slim pickings. You return with barely enough to feed a dog.

critical_failure.text: The food you brought back was spoiled. Half the men who ate it are sick.

decline.text: The quartermaster needed hands. He won't forget your refusal.

title: Lead a Patrol
description: Take three men and sweep the eastern woods. Clear out any trouble.

success.text: You find and scatter a small bandit camp. No losses. Your men would follow you anywhere.

failure.text: You walked into an ambush. Two men wounded. They blame your poor leadership.

critical_failure.text: The patrol was massacred. Only you came back. The captain's silence is worse than any curse.

decline.text: The captain assigns someone else. Your refusal marks you as a coward.

title: Inspect Defenses
description: Check the walls and fortifications. Find weaknesses before the enemy does.

success.text: You mark three weak points and suggest fixes. The captain orders them strengthened immediately.

failure.text: You miss an obvious gap in the stakes. The captain finds it himself and questions your judgment.

decline.text: 'Too busy to check our defenses?' The captain's tone is deadly quiet.
